name: medicurerx
0:
”Alexa, open medicure r. x.”
”Alexa, ask medicure r. x. to list all medicines”
”Alexa, ask medicure r. x. to get expiry date”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: medicure r. x.
des:
The medicure r. x. app aims to curb the age-old problem of trying to figure out the expiry date of used medicines. Often the expiry date is lost while taking out tablets
from the packets, which leads to doubt while going for the medicine again. It can, at times, make us dispose medicines which are not expired or consume the expired ones.

The app takes on a revolutionary way to help prevent these problems by remembering the name of the medicines along with their expiry date.
This functionality will add the following abilities to the Alexa environment:

1) Adding a medicine name along with its expiry
2) Removing a medicine
3) Listing all the available medicines
4) Retrieving the expiry date for a particular medicine

By providing such easy to use features, the 'medicure r. x.' system aims to empower and help the patients in taking conscious steps towards their well-being.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
